document_data.mainbody:
ndelos Tankard was a low-end tavern located in the Silverscales neighborhood of Ravens Bluff during the late 14 century DR. Its patrons were mainly impoverished sailors who couldnt afford to carouse in more lively establishments.
The tavern was located on the west side of Fishleap Lane within the Harbor District.
The dilapidated wooden bar had the atmosphere and accommodations of a set of abandoned ruins. It offered watery beer that could be conveniently evacuated into the bucket that was kept as a privy.
